entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a StringBuilder equivalent of String.Create #63176
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for Ed25519 #63174
  • ICustomMarshaler tests seems incomplete #63172
  • Support more than one jsoncontext in aspnet core #63171
  • Help - Using compiled library DLLs directly instead of nupkg errors out at compile time #63169
  • [MacCatalyst] System.Xml.XmlSerializer.Tests timed out #63168
  • [WASM][Browser] DebuggerTests.ArrayTests: EXECUTION TIMED OUT #63167
  • Logging properly handles arrays, but not within tuples #63165
  • [API Proposal]: Simple, modern TCP APIs #63162
  • How to get the socket information from HttpClient request? #63159
  • BigInteger may stack overflow when converting to a string with custom format providers #63158

Closed

  • TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset.TotalMinutes is wrong for "Morocco Standard Time". Expected: 60; Actual: 0. #63164
  • [Arm64] Use stp (SIMD) in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #48934
    Future
  • Opportunities to improve TE Platform-Plaintext benchmark #63059
  • TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset.TotalMinutes is wrong for "Morocco Standard Time". Expected: 60; Actual: 0. #63170
  • surapolservice #63161
  • why Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json use SortedDictionary? #40697
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix _il suffix for _d/_r-variant ilproj tests #63178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Switch to objwriter from the dotnet/llvm-project repo #63177
    * NO MERGE *, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Increase timeout for debugger tests on CI #63173

Merged

  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove unneeded ifdefs #63160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify build mode for one previously missed form _opt_dbg / _opt_rel #63175
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use shared strings for Array:Copy exception messages #63163
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/tailcall tests and make them mergeable #63031
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve auto-formatting of ref/System.Runtime #63139
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1528579 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • Superpmi.py: Detect changes in jiteeversionguid.h #63000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute("") is not correctly taken into account when the receiver is a struct #58514

Closed

  • IDE0161 - #endif not retained [C#] #58510
  • CS8345 (ERR_FieldAutoPropCantBeByRefLike) wording can be misleading #58513
  • Intellisense suggesting code improvement not supported for the project's C# version #58133
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main into features/RawStringLiterals #58511
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • declaration errors #58507
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Make sure Index and Range are acceptable before offering refactorings #58516
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report level 7 name warning for `record` when langversion is below 9 #58452
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable indenter tests #58488
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #39218
  • ASP.NET CORE 6 - Blazor - Infer the component type for child components from a method #39217
  • Make REST API a hosted service explicitly #39215
  • Rendering Razor component in server mode in MVC project in partial view - left with empty tag -> related to issues 20332 (unresolved) , 13771 #39214
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #39210

Closed

  • Blazor JSInterop Callback to .NET Method fails with dotnet.js: Cannot set properties of undefined in async javascript webgpu context #39173
  • [.NET 6.0 Blazor server] same sessionId for two browser connected on same Machine #39096
  • not working blazor server on docker compose #39190
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • delete me #39211

PullRequests

Created

  • Use NullabilityInfoContext in DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider #39219
    area-mvc
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #39209
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix: InputRadioGroup not registering initial click in some circumstances #39208
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Sync shared code from runtime #39213
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Migrate JSInterop to ESLint #39162
    area-blazor
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No splash screen on Windows #3870
  • Shell should support setting queryparameters in a ShellContent instance (in XAML) #3868
  • net6.0-android generated sources compile error(don't support covariant for return value ) #3867
  • Packaged WPF Blazor WebView app crashes when looking for wwwroot in system32 #3866

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that changing RowSpacing/ColumnSpacing invalidates grid #3873
  • 3346 appsettings json embedded resource #3872
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
  • Implement TextTransform for Controls.Button #3869
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
